definition: to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: I rely on my parents to feed and clothe me.
sentences.chinese: 我仰赖父母让我吃饱穿暖。

sentences.english: The performance of the human eye largely depends on the level of illuminance in the visual field.
sentences.chinese: 在视野中人类的眼睛表现大量地仰赖照明度的水平。

sentences.english: That inturn may harm animals that depend on the trees for food or shelter.
sentences.chinese: 那一个内弯可能伤害为食物或庇护所仰赖树的动物。

sentences.english: Yet when you relied on the Lord , he delivered them into your hand.
sentences.chinese: 只因你仰赖耶和华，他便将他们交在你手里。

sentences.english: We are to simply trust God.
sentences.chinese: 我们所要做的祇是信靠仰赖神。

sentences.english: Pitchers don't just rely on speed to get a pitch past a batter.
sentences.chinese: 投手不只仰赖速度让打击者打不到球。

sentences.english: In the infant formula industry, the product must rely on the prescription or introduction from the health care physicians (HCPs).
sentences.chinese: 在婴儿奶粉产业中，产品需仰赖医院医护人员的推荐。

sentences.english: Paralysis of respiratory muscles often requires the use of mechanical ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸肌的偏瘫无力常导致病患需要仰赖呼吸器。

sentences.english: So much depends on Mother Earth and Her vibrational system.
sentences.chinese: 有这么多仰赖大地之母和她的震动的系统。

sentences.english: Due to the conductive ground plane, the field strength does not only depend on the polarization.
sentences.chinese: 由于传导性的地面飞机，领域力量不只仰赖偏极化。

sentences.english: Thestate whaling company is kept afloat with cheap loans and subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 国有捕鲸公司的存在也仰赖于低息贷款和补贴。

sentences.english: And governments also rely on confidential communication online as well as offline.
sentences.chinese: 政府也仰赖网上和网下的机密交流。

sentences.english: But you can't be totally dependent on him for self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 不过，对于妳的自信，你也不能完全仰赖他。

sentences.english: Yet, it is up to the master builder to make sure everything is done appropriately.
sentences.chinese: 但要确认每个环节都妥善进行，则全仰赖造船大师。

sentences.english: Not to be stuck with depending on chauvinist lamas.
sentences.chinese: 不被仰赖沙文主义的喇嘛所捆绑。

definition: to rely on/to be dependent on
to rely on sb for support
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]
to give credit/to give sb his due/attribution
in order that/so that/so as to/to cause sth
to shift resources into areas of need/to inject funds/to balance resources
